about_the_game:
Step into the treacherous yet alluring shoes of the Dark Lord, steering a realm filled with eccentric characters and convoluted plots. As you stretch your tendrils of darkness across new lands, exercise your cunning in balancing political intrigues and military might. Juggle advisors who are as likely to stab you in the back as they are to kneel in awe. Fortify your stronghold, and revel in a narrative that’s as endlessly unfolding as it is drenched in layers of deliciously dark humor. The cherry on top? Community Stories Mode, where you can dive into the tales crafted by other players, as well as compose and share your own adventures using a convenient editor.



Dive deep into a rich strategic role-playing game with roguelike elements and embark on an adventure unlike any other. As the enigmatic Dark Lord, watch as chaos reigns in your kingdom. Cultivate your territories, manage cunning advisors, mastermind devious conspiracies, and tackle quests brimming with dark, witty humor.





In a realm where shadows dominate, humor—of the darkest kind—finds its way. Relish in the game's unique brand of comedy as you expand your domain, engage with quirky subjects, and embark on hilariously twisted quests. Face challenges with a wicked grin!






Your choices have weight, dictating the twists and turns of the narrative. From outsmarting assassins to navigating interactions with wise yet cunning advisors, craft a tale unique to your reign. Get ready for challenging trials and complex tasks. What fate awaits your kingdom? It's in your hands!






Find the delicate balance between military might and cunning political intrigues, as not all battles are won with strength. Skillfully manage your advisors to solidify your rule, but beware, as they may engage in their own treacherous game behind your back.






The hand-crafted visuals of the game plunge you deep into the ambiance of a brooding kingdom. Every detail, every shadow speaks of a world built with care and passion, ensuring a visually captivating journey intertwined with riveting narratives.




As you ascend the throne of darkness, you'll find that ruling is no easy task. Trust comes at a premium; decide who to execute for disloyalty and who to shower with gold for their undying allegiance. Yet, beware—today's faithful servant may be tomorrow's backstabbing traitor. And if you think you can play favorites, think again. Pin your advisors against each other in a treacherous game of divide and rule, ensuring no single advisor gains enough power to challenge your dark reign.



Are you a master of your own destiny? Get ready to craft your saga in the dark kingdom! Clear your mind, flex those fingers, and dive into creating your unique game scenario. Design the narrative, set the rules, name your subjects, and orchestrate every twist and turn. Then, share your grand vision with fellow Dark Lords — they're waiting to be awed by your creativity. In your kingdom, you're the one who calls the shots!

short_description: Unleash your power in Dark Lord, a roguelike RPG filled with strategy, adventure, and sardonic wit. Rule your growing realm with an iron fist in Story Mode, dive deep into the legends created by other players, or forge your own in Community Stories Mode!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
